patthana14.11:1.1_0: Lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.11:2.1_0: Lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.11:2.1_1: Lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.11:2.1_2: (Lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokiyo ca nalokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.)
patthana14.11:3.1_0: Lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.11:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha pañca.)
